post-2.0 bug review: I'm waiting on an installation of xfree86

Hello All,

> I am currently trying to connect to a Solaris 8 box to run eclipse
> (Version 2.0.1) through a Xterm session using reflectionX from a Win32
> machine. When I try to run eclipse, it breaks. I think I stumbled across a
> bug in the past which mentioned the terminal session problems but have not
> been able to find an update on it. 

> Could some one provide me with the latest update on the status of the bug
> and when it is likely to be fixed ?

Fixed > 0919 with Silenio.  Accessing the motif implementation from a 32-bit 
display, which is typical for win32 environments, was revealing the problem.  
Notes:

1. Changed the title to better reflect the problem.
2. This fix is not in today's M1 build.
3. If after getting this fix (integration build >= 0924) you see an exception 
like the one below then see bug 21695.  This is a different problem which seems 
to occur as a result of using a 1.4 jre.  Sample trace (note the client putImage
(), not scalePixmap()):

java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.ImageData.blit(ImageData.java:2318)
        at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.putImage(Image.java:1200)
        at org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Image.init(Image.java:988)
        ...
*** Bug 25296 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
